column4: im still have problems with dns resolution, it is very slow w ubuntu - i have already disabled ipv6
In firefox, or across the whole system?
its just going to get overwritten
it gets faster whenever I change it, then it will get slow again after a while
Then ask how to make permanent changes do your DNS.
well it works fine with the default dns servers in debian and in windows
Interesting.  Does lsmod|grep ipv show anything?
yeah for instance I just switched back to the regular dns servers (from 128.151.2.1) and its workign fine
its working fine - you mean firefox?
no, again this is system-wide. I dont even have X started right now
